description: This file defines a Flutter widget called MainNavigation, which manages the main bottom navigation bar of the app, switching between various screens like Dashboard, Students, Staff, Attendance, Schedule, Messages, and Notifications. It also integrates notification and message badges to indicate unread counts.

classes.name: MainNavigation
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that provides the main bottom navigation interface for the app, allowing users to navigate between core screens with badge indicators for unread notifications and messages.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for MainNavigation widget.

methods.name: _MainNavigationState
methods.description: State class managing the current index of selected screen, the list of screen widgets, and building the Scaffold with bottom navigation.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the MainNavigation, including IndexedStack for screens and BottomNavigationBar with notification/message badges.
